name: Gulmarg
description: Gulmarg is a beautiful place situated in Baramulla district of Kashmir valley.Also know as the winter-wonderland it is famous for gondola ride and various snow activities like sking and snowboarding.

name: Doodhpathri
description: Nature's Serenity Unveiled. An off-beat hill station situated 42km away from capital city of Srinagar

name: Srinagar
description: Srinagar is the summer capital of Jammu & Kashmir. It is situated in Kashmir valley and lies on banks of Jehlum River, a tributary of the Indus. The city is famous for its gardens, lakes and houseboats.
